t: Q: Is this a real battery daddy or a knock off?
s: It's fake. It might be from the same manufacturer but it's not branded "battery daddy" so the people who came up with the idea don't get any credit. Just another example of Chinese manufacturers stealing from people who work hard to market their product, no matter how silly it might seem.
